messages.content: what is the name of the largest building in the world?

The largest building in the world by total floor area is the New Century Global Center, located in Chengdu, China. It covers approximately 1.7 million square meters (18.3 million square feet). If you're referring to the tallest building, that would be the Burj Khalifa in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, which stands at 828 meters (2,717 feet) tall.
